12 namespace zserio

14 
16 template <typename ALLOC>
17 struct ValidationSqliteUtil
18 {
19  using string_type = zserio::string<RebindAlloc<ALLOC, char>>;
20  using Statement = std::unique_ptr<sqlite3_stmt, SqliteFinalizer>;
21 
25  struct ColumnDescription
26  {
27  string_type name;
28  string_type type;
29  bool isNotNull;
30  bool isPrimaryKey;
31  };
32 
33  using TableSchema = std::map<
34  string_type, ColumnDescription,
35  std::less<string_type>, RebindAlloc<ALLOC, std::pair<const string_type, ColumnDescription>>>;
36 
49  static size_t getNumberOfTableRows(SqliteConnection& connection, StringView attachedDbName,
50  StringView tableName, const ALLOC& allocator)
51  {
52  string_type sqlQuery(allocator);
53  sqlQuery += "SELECT count(*) FROM ";
54  if (!attachedDbName.empty())
55  {
56  sqlQuery += attachedDbName;
57  sqlQuery += ".";
58  }
59  sqlQuery += tableName;
60 
61  Statement statement(connection.prepareStatement(sqlQuery));
62  const int result = sqlite3_step(statement.get());
63  if (result != SQLITE_ROW)
64  {
65  throw SqliteException(
66  "ValidationSqliteUtils.getNumberOfTableRows: sqlite3_step() failed: ") +
67  SqliteErrorCode(result);
68  }
69 
70  return static_cast<size_t>(sqlite3_column_int64(statement.get(), 0));
71  }
72 
73 
83  static void getTableSchema(SqliteConnection& connection, StringView attachedDbName,
84  StringView tableName, TableSchema& tableSchema, const ALLOC& allocator)
85  {
86  string_type sqlQuery(allocator);
87  sqlQuery += "PRAGMA ";
88  if (!attachedDbName.empty())
89  {
90  sqlQuery += attachedDbName;
91  sqlQuery += ".";
92  }
93  sqlQuery += "table_info(";
94  sqlQuery += tableName;
95  sqlQuery += ")";
96 
97  Statement statement(connection.prepareStatement(sqlQuery));
98 
99  int result = SQLITE_OK;
100  while ((result = sqlite3_step(statement.get())) == SQLITE_ROW)
101  {
102  const char* columnName = reinterpret_cast<const char*>(sqlite3_column_text(statement.get(), 1));
103  const char* columnType = reinterpret_cast<const char*>(sqlite3_column_text(statement.get(), 2));
104  tableSchema.emplace(string_type(columnName, allocator),
105  ColumnDescription
106  {
107  string_type(columnName, allocator),
108  string_type(columnType, allocator),
109  sqlite3_column_int(statement.get(), 3) != 0, // is not null
110  sqlite3_column_int(statement.get(), 5) != 0 // is primary key
111  });
112  }
113 
114  if (result != SQLITE_DONE)
115  {
116  throw SqliteException(
117  "ValidationSqliteUtils.getTableSchema: sqlite3_step() failed: ") +
118  SqliteErrorCode(result);
119  }
120  }
121 
135  static bool isColumnInTable(SqliteConnection& connection, StringView attachedDbName,
136  StringView tableName, StringView columnName, const ALLOC& allocator)
137  {
138  // try select to check if hidden column exists
139  string_type sqlQuery(allocator);
140  sqlQuery += "SELECT ";
141  sqlQuery += columnName;
142  sqlQuery += " FROM ";
143  if (!attachedDbName.empty())
144  {
145  sqlQuery += attachedDbName;
146  sqlQuery += ".";
147  }
148  sqlQuery += tableName;
149  sqlQuery += " LIMIT 0";
150 
151  try
152  {
153  Statement statement(connection.prepareStatement(sqlQuery));
154  return sqlite3_step(statement.get()) == SQLITE_DONE;
155  }
156  catch (const SqliteException&)
157  {
158  return false;
159  }
160  }
161 };
162 
163 } // namespace zserio
